710060.name: Fantasy Grounds - Feats of Legend: 20 Infernal Feats (PFRPG)
710060.description:
Feats of Legend: 20 Infernal Feats

Do I smell brimstone? Inside this edition of Feats of Legend is 20 new infernal feats. These feats are designed for use with any character looking to deal with the lower planes. Master hellfire, learn to fight like a Kyton, shoot unholy bullets or pledge your mortal soul for a a taste of power.
Inside, you'll find awesome new feats like:
  • Blasphemous Tongue
  • Call of the Damned
  • Chains of Perdition
  • Improved Chains of Perdition
  • Dark Channel
  • Devil's Advocate
  • Fiendish Codex
  • Fire and Brimstone
  • Improved Fire and Brimstone
  • Hellfire Initiate
  • Hellfire Acolyte
  • Hellfire Master
  • Inured to the Infernal
  • Luck of the Devil
  • Pledged to Darkness
  • Protection of the Pit
  • Improved Protection of the Pit
  • Greater Protection of the Pit
  • Speak of the Devil
  • Tongue of the Pit
Up your game with Feats of Legend!
Converted for Fantasy Grounds by Rob Twohy
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included Pathfinder Ruleset (3.5E Compatible).
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Team Twohy LLC
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included Pathfinder RPG and D&D 3.5/ OGL ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
